eligibility: Any Indian citizen without an active bank account.
how_to_apply: Visit nearest bank or banking correspondent.
detailed_info: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana is a government welfare initiative under the finance sector. It is designed to support all citizens by providing structured financial assistance, subsidies, insurance coverage, or service benefits as defined in official guidelines. Applicants must meet the specified age and income criteria and submit the required documents through authorized government portals or offices. The scheme operates strictly under government supervision to ensure transparency and direct benefit transfer to eligible beneficiaries.

It is designed to support low income families by providing structured financial assistance, subsidies, insurance coverage, or service benefits as defined in official guidelines. Applicants must meet the specified age and income criteria and submit the required documents through authorized government portals or offices. The scheme operates strictly under government supervision to ensure transparency and direct benefit transfer to eligible beneficiaries.
